message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's start with a 90/10 split.  Hope you like it!
I'm not impressed with your first offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I think we can do better.  Let's split it 80/20.  This time, I'm serious!
You're not budging, huh? Alright, I'll make a smaller offer. Take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, Bob. We both know the value of the money is dropping, let's split it 60/40 and call it a day.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect any more generosity from me!
